revised_title: Assessing and Predicting Carcinogenic Hazards in Natural and Man-Made Environments
tldr: This article discusses the assessment of carcinogenic hazards in both natural and man-made environments. It explores the origins of cytotoxic chemicals, their types, and the challenges in predicting their potential risks. The author emphasizes the importance of vigilance and screening tests to ensure the safety of chemical substances and their impact on human health and the environment.
